Review the terms before creating your account.
Open Learning Exchange Applications: Planet, myPlanet, and myPlanetLite

By selecting "Accept" within this Android application, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to the terms set out in this End User License Agreement (the "Agreement").
If you do not agree, you must select "Cancel" and stop using the application.
Open Learning Exchange ("OLE") owns the Planet, myPlanet, and myPlanetLite applications, including their content, design, code, and related materials.
OLE grants you a limited, personal, non-exclusive, and non-transferable license to install and use this Android application solely for the purposes authorized by your institution or organization.
4.1 The Applications must collect and process the personal data required for user authentication, operation, and synchronization.
4.2 All data transmitted or stored by the Applications is encrypted in compliance with applicable security standards.
4.3 You accept that using the Applications involves this secure processing.
If you decide to unsubscribe or delete your account, you must contact an administrator within the Planet platform, who will manage access closure or data deletion according to established procedures.
• Use the application responsibly and in accordance with applicable regulations.
• Keep the assigned login information secure.
• Report any misuse or suspicious behavior to your institutional administrator.
OLE may update these terms when necessary. Continuing to use the application after any change constitutes acceptance of the updated Agreement.
• You fully accept its terms and conditions.
Use these details to fill in the login form
This app uses artificial intelligence to translate content. By continuing, you agree to our Privacy Policy.
This survey content was translated using artificial intelligence.
Choose how many voices to load at once
Groups you are a member of and can participate in.
Choose a team from the menu to see its updates.
You are not part of any team yet. You can join one to get started.
Connect to a server to view your teams.
We couldn\'t determine your user. Please sign in again.
We couldn\'t find your login details. Please sign in again.
We couldn\'t load your teams. Try again later.
Do you want to cancel your request to join this team?
There are no members in this team yet.
We couldn\'t load the team members right now.
Sign in to view team members.
Set a server to view team members.
Profile is not available for this member.
Could not remove %1$s. Please try again.
Add users to the team by pressing the + button.
Unable to load users to invite right now.
Could not add %1$s to the team.
Unable to add this user right now.
This Privacy Policy explains how MyPlanet Lite, provided through your organization, handles personal data when you use the app.

We collect:
• Account details (name, username, email, organization).
• Usage and diagnostics (session activity, feature interactions, device and app version).
• Optional content you submit (posts, survey responses, uploaded media).
We use your information to provide and improve the service, personalize your experience, keep your account secure, and comply with legal obligations.

Your data helps us deliver core features, synchronize learning content, personalize language and locale settings, improve performance and reliability, and support security, fraud prevention, and investigations.

Information is stored on secure servers managed by OLE or your organization with access controls and encryption in transit. We retain data only as long as needed to provide the service, meet legal requirements, enforce agreements, or resolve disputes, with limited retention for backups.

We do not sell personal data. Information may be shared with trusted service providers (such as hosting, analytics, or notification platforms) under data protection agreements, with your organization\'s administrators to manage accounts, or when required by law.

You can review or update profile details in the app. Where applicable, you may request access, correction, deletion, restriction, or portability of your data, or object to certain processing. You may withdraw optional data you provide by deleting that content or discontinuing its submission.

We use technical and organizational safeguards—including transport encryption (TLS), authentication controls, least-privilege access, and monitoring—to reduce risks of unauthorized access or disclosure. Please keep your credentials secure.
The app is intended for authorized learners through partner organizations. If a child\'s data is collected without the required consent, contact us so we can remove it.
We may update this policy to reflect product, security, or legal changes. Significant updates will be communicated through in-app notices or other appropriate channels.
For questions or to exercise your privacy rights, contact your organization administrator or our support team.
Review and edit your personal information.
